meta.description: This is Codex Software landing page

title: Digital Tranformation
For Art & Culture Industry
welcome.subtitle: Custom software solutions for museums, expositions, archives and libraries.

articleWithImageAndText.title: Services
articleWithImageAndText.text: We help Art & Culture institutions and startups craft innovative software to showcase, store, manage, and promote works of art.

textBoxes.title: Software MVP Development
textBoxes.subtitle: Bring the app to market as fast as possible
textBoxes.text: A team of skilled UX experts, product engineers, and business analysts will help you prototype, test, and validate your ideas quickly and efficiently.

textBoxes.title: Software Product Evolution
textBoxes.subtitle: Enhance and extend your product at any stage
textBoxes.text: Hire a full-service engineering team to improve design, usability, performance, scalability and security of an existing software product, or add new product features.

textBoxes.title: Software Modernisation
textBoxes.subtitle: Revitalise your legacy systems
textBoxes.text: Receive full range of services to turn outdated software into a modern solution with a better user experience, lower maintenance costs, and extended functionality.

articleWithImageAndText2.title: Solutions
articleWithImageAndText2.text: We create custom software solutions that shape the future of cultural preservation.

textBoxes.title: Library Management Software
textBoxes.subtitle: Digital means to improve, optimise and streamline library management

textBoxes.title: Archive Management Software
textBoxes.subtitle: Custom software solutions to efficiently curate, process and store documents and artworks

textBoxes.title: Museum Apps
textBoxes.subtitle: Transform and enhance visitor experience in museums, expositions and art venues

textBoxes.title: Inventory Management Software
textBoxes.subtitle: Manage and control how works of art are stored, exchanged and transferred

textBoxes.title: Event Management Systems
textBoxes.subtitle: Improve and innovate the way events are organized and held

textBoxes.title: Data Analytics & Visualisation
textBoxes.subtitle: Gather, process and visualise data to make data-driven decisions

imageArticle.title: Need a Custom Art & Culture Software Solution?
imageArticle.subtitle: Send us a request. We'll be glad to help you:
list: Refine, document, analyse and assess your requirements
Staff your team with Software Developers, Data Scientists, Business Analysts
Save up to 40% of costs if compared to running an in-house team

imageBoxes.title: CultureConnect
imageBoxes.description: Culture Connect is a software platform that helps art institutions build digital interactive experiences. Looking to power-up the development of the core product, they engaged with Codex and received an end-to-end team led by the head of development. This helped to implement numerous architectural and holistic product improvements, add new features, and led to a lucrative acquisition deal with Axiell in late 2019.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “We have an ongoing relationship with Codex Software. They’re highly productive and efficient, working well together to quickly solve problems. I trust them and rate the quality of their work very highly.”

imageBoxes.title: Axiell
imageBoxes.description: We partnered with one of the world’s largest providers of software solutions for cultural and educational institutions after the closure of the deal between Axiell and Culture Connect. Still remaining the primary developers of Culture Connect’s core product, Codex also helps to build, improve and extend the range of Axiell’s other software solutions and services.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex Software provided exemplary services, ranging from quality assurance to technical leadership. Their engineers are skilled, communicate smoothly and contribute to the success of our products. Can’t be more satisfied.”
